track.name: Just The Two Of Us
comments: Grover I can't say enough to complement him....
ahhh so much better than the crappy will smith version
GROVERRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR !!! I Always Will Love You...
memories of a bar in crete. happy days. and i only bought the winelight album cos i liked the cover. best buy ever.
i wish last.fm had a replay button.

When Withers went in to record his vocals, it was the first time he met Washington. They were rarely together when they recorded this, and they never got to know each other very well. Withers admired Washington because Grover did the first cover version of any song he'd written - an instrumental version of "Ain't No Sunshine" that appeared on his first album. Since then, hundreds of artists have covered Withers' songs.
http://www.songfacts.com/detail.php?id=3109
Really miss Grover so much. Grover Washington has brighten' so many of my days. I was listening to him from the very beginning. Early 70's, even befor Mr Magic.
Great sax ! Great Vocals ! Great Song !
Outstanding organization between two outstanding artist.
